input.title: input
input.description: A querySelector to find the input

find.description: A querySelectorAll rule to find each of the find terms

placeholder.description: text to show when no results

visible.description: class to add to matched elements

hidden.description: class to add to non-matched elements

dynamic.description: if true, this will refresh the content every search

contenteditable.description: needs to be true if the input is a contenteditable field instead of an input

instant.description: in case you don't want to wait for DOMContentLoaded before starting Holmes
